name: BAppCard
desc: It provides alignment for own children like grid, based on rows and columns.

infoArray.name: children
infoArray.desc: Can be used to render elements inside the Card.

infoArray.name: containerStyle
infoArray.desc: Override the inline-styles of the container element.

infoArray.name: style
infoArray.desc: Override the inline-styles of the root element.

infoArray.name: title
infoArray.desc: Indicates the title of new application

infoArray.name: svgIcon
infoArray.desc: Indicates the path of new application button icon

infoArray.name: iconTitleText
infoArray.desc: Indicates the title of new application button icon

infoArray.name: isNewAppCard
infoArray.desc: If true, this app card component is for new application

infoArray.name: buttonTitles
infoArray.desc: Indicatest the button title of new application card
